title: Nicoise salad
ingredients: ['225g new potatoes, quartered', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped parsley', '55g (pitted) black olives', '1/2 onion, thinly sliced', '1 (185g) tin tuna', '150g French green beans - trimmed and blanched', '225g mixed salad greens', '235ml salad vinaigrette', '3 hard-boiled eggs, quartered', '3 plum tomatoes, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon capers', '4 anchovies']
